value.string_value: New episode with my good friends Sholto Douglas & Trenton Bricken. Sholto focuses on scaling RL and Trenton researches mechanistic interpretability, both at ...
How Does Claude 4 Think? – Sholto Douglas & Trenton Bricken

legacy.full_text: dwarkesh's most recent episode with sholto + trenton is one of the best resources for vibe-checking your takes on LLMs/AI and thinking on the near-future, since broadly everything they say here is both correct and good: https://t.co/YCUQBtVkyZ

it does an unusually good job at covering many topics in a 'short' time period which really helps one converge on quality thinking.

so even if you think you might already know the content that will be covered it may still help refresh and connect dots in a salient and useful way

in fact i'm worried that i agree too much with almost everything that is said, which is sometimes a sign one is in too much of an intellectual bubble.

there's a few authors that i had this phenomenon happen with, but some people just keep being right over and over it turns out!

it is so funny to see this tweet at 106 likes after only 32 minutes - 3.3 likes per minute!

in around two hours or so, twitter will apply its deboosting algorithm to it as it contains a LINK!

so, you can do the math depending on when you read this and see the result!
